name: [Almost] One Room
description:
[Almost] One Room is a little game where you will need to find a number combination hidden in "a room"... well, not exactly one... but one at the same time. You'll have to go through 6 variations of the same room to find the combination that will let you win the game. Would you find all the numbers?

Controls:

  • WASD or analog gamepad to move
  • Mouse or secondary analog gamepad to look around
  • Mouse buttons, "E" and triggers to interact (change numbers in the panels)
  • Escape to exit

Credits:
  • Coding by Xavier "Theck" Borrut (@theck0)
  • Art by Carlos Coronado (@carlosgamedev)
  • Music and sound effects from various sources from https://www.freesound.org/
  • Game developed using Unreal Engine 4
